thread.title_full: The Broadmoor, Little Nell are only Colorado hotels on new 5-star list

author: Ben Miller
title: The Broadmoor, Little Nell are only Colorado hotels on new 5-star list
text: The Broadmoor resort hotel in Colorado Springs. Bloomberg The Broadmoor Hotel in Colorado Springs and the Little Nell Hotel in Aspen were the only Colorado hotels to be given five stars on a new list of the world's top hotels. The Forbes Travel Guide also awarded five stars to the Broadmoor's Penrose Restaurant and another five stars for its spa, and the Broadmoor was the only Colorado hotel receiving five stars each for its hotel, restaurant and spa. The Broadmoor resort hotel in Colorado Springs. Bloomberg “What an honor it is to receive this Triple Crown of distinction from Forbes,” says Broadmoor President and CEO Jack Damioli , in a statement. Also receiving five stars on the list was the Little Nell's Element 47 restaurant. The only other five star-receiving Colorado entity was The Spa at Four Seasons Resort and Residences Vail. Twenty-three other Colorado hotels, spas and restaurants were awarded four stars from the Forbes Travel Guide, including three Denver hotels: The Brown Palace , the Four Seasons and the Ritz-Carlton.
